title: About
para1: Hi, my name is Mike (aka pkmnfrk in many places), and I'd like to thank you for trying out my mod. It has been a wild few months while I learn the detailed ins and outs of Minecraft modding, and at the end of it all is a thing that I'm happy to put out into the world for people to see.
para2: However, I'm not perfect, and neither is MegaCorp. I'm sure there are bugs, and certainly the list of other mods that it could support will never be complete. If you find a bug, or want to see a mod supported, or anything like that, please let me know at one of these places:
